6a395d16-49df-41d5-b8d6-cec9f8dd215f.description: Earning the DocuSign CLM Administration Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of the basic functions of contract lifecycle management using DocuSign CLM features such as eForms, Smart Rules, and Document Generation.
6a395d16-49df-41d5-b8d6-cec9f8dd215f.name: DocuSign CLM Administration Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the DocuSign CLM: Administration instructor-led course, the DocuSign CLM: Administration self-paced learning plan, or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign CLM Administration Specialist exam.

a9a4b818-9e55-424b-984c-7728a33cd88a.description: Earning the DocuSign eSignature Administration Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of how to set up an account; manage users on the account; configure settings for branding, sending, and signing; as well as, share envelopes between users.
a9a4b818-9e55-424b-984c-7728a33cd88a.name: DocuSign eSignature Administration Specialist

9e572ec8-5f3f-4679-8f80-75d7df5a503a.description: Earning the DocuSign CLM Workflow Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of how to use the DocuSign CLM advanced workflow process designer to configure simple to complex workflows, working knowledge of best practices, standard conventions, and the application of advanced workflow functionality to solve real-world business cases.
9e572ec8-5f3f-4679-8f80-75d7df5a503a.name: DocuSign CLM Workflow Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the DocuSign CLM Process Automation instructor-led course or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign CLM Workflow Specialist exam.

3b974ab4-168a-495d-a3e6-89ce81261469.description: Earning the DocuSign eSignature Template Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of creating, using and managing DocuSign templates including Bulk Send, AutoPlace and PowerForms.
3b974ab4-168a-495d-a3e6-89ce81261469.name: DocuSign eSignature Template Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Template Fundamentals instructor-led course, or the DocuSign Template related self-paced courses, or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign eSignature Template Specialist exam.

9ec008fd-f9fa-4797-8a35-207383a5f378.description: Earning the DocuSign Agreement Cloud Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of DocuSign and its capabilities; an understanding of how the DocuSign Agreement Cloud can help transform and modernize systems of agreement and core processes; knowledge of DocuSign program and project frameworks; techniques for discovering, prioritizing, and deploying use cases; and strategies for increasing adoption and expansion of the DocuSign program.
9ec008fd-f9fa-4797-8a35-207383a5f378.name: DocuSign Agreement Cloud Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the How to Accelerate Agreements instructor-led course, or the Adoption: How to Accelerate Agreements self-paced learning plan, or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign Agreement Cloud Specialist exam.

d48da6a2-02da-425e-a9d8-ea8e949fd114.description: Earning the DocuSign Organization Management Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of DocuSign Admin, including administrator and user management, bulk actions, sharing and transferring ownership, and access management.
d48da6a2-02da-425e-a9d8-ea8e949fd114.name: DocuSign Organization Management Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Get Started with DocuSign: Organization Management self-paced learning plan, or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign Organization Management Specialist exam.

60862763-44dd-4f5b-a344-9bc978545584.description: Earning the DocuSign for Salesforce Administration Specialist credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of the DocuSign apps available in the DocuSign Apps Launcher package, including DocuSign Gen for Salesforce, DocuSign Negotiate for Salesforce, and DocuSign eSignature for Salesforce. Areas of focus include installation and configuration, creating and using Gen templates, collaborating on documents, and sending and managing envelopes in Salesforce.
60862763-44dd-4f5b-a344-9bc978545584.name: DocuSign for Salesforce Administration Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the DocuSign + Salesforce: Gen, Negotiate, and eSignature self-paced learning plan or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign for Salesforce Administration Specialist exam.

This credential is available only to authorized DocuSign partners and employees.
a45ce93d-c4f9-4b8a-b6e8-4235c70bd0e1.name: DocuSign Sales Executive Specialist

f6ba6b5e-f490-4759-9bd1-5543264f6fb5.description: Earning the DocuSign CLM Essentials Administration Specialist badge indicates that the candidate is able to administer a CLM Essentials account and use the product features to generate, view, and act on agreements with or without Salesforce.

2a726490-a08f-45e3-8220-b405e7631950.description: Earning the DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert (Gold) credential demonstrates that the candidate has developed broader and deeper expertise and has shown leadership in selling, supporting, and/or driving adoption of the DocuSign Agreement Cloud. This credential is available only to DocuSign employees in customer-facing roles.
2a726490-a08f-45e3-8220-b405e7631950.name: DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert 2023 (Gold)

badge_template_activities.title: DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert (Silver)
Successful completion of a series of additional hands-on activities, demonstrations, and written exams.
Demonstrated leadership and duration of field experience as outlined by the program.
Participation in peer mentoring and enablement programs.
Evaluation and validation of successful completion by management

a603ae7f-1673-418f-a07a-5f67bf1e9711.description: Earning the DocuSign eSignature Technical Consultant credential demonstrates that the candidate has working knowledge of developing technical solutions for DocuSign eSignature including the DocuSign go-live process, managing in-process envelopes using API requests, creating custom Connect configurations, building Connect webhook listeners, configuring DocuSign Monitor, and implementing both authorization code grant and JWT grant authentication flows.
a603ae7f-1673-418f-a07a-5f67bf1e9711.name: DocuSign eSignature Technical Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the eSignature Technical Consultant self-paced learning plan, or equivalent real-world experience.
Take and pass the DocuSign eSignature Technical Consultant exam.

170eaf2b-d2cc-4cf5-bfb2-4208c4a13417.description: Success Planning for Growth is a program for DocuSign Customer Success Managers (CSMs) to develop their understanding of customer business objectives and address them through impactful conversations. This program ensures CSMs can advise their customers on how to maximize value from their DocuSign investment. CSMs that earn this badge are high performing, highly skilled professionals who enable, support and expand customer use cases. This badge is available for internal CSMs who are P4 and above.
170eaf2b-d2cc-4cf5-bfb2-4208c4a13417.name: DocuSign Customer Success Planning Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Success Planning For Growth self-paced modules and knowledge checks within DocuSign University.

Successfully demonstrate how you have applied your Success Planning skills by completing the following: Select one customer of your choice and Present to a panel of experts how you have led your customer from Value Creation through to Value Messaging with clear examples.
This credential is available only to DocuSign Customer Success Managers who are P4 and above.

skills.name: Collect Baseline Data to Verify ROI

fa7b93d7-fd03-4a7b-960d-df0ce8324e40.description: This badge was earned by achieving Super User status on the DocuSign Community in 2022! This achievement requires dedication to spending time answering questions, which makes the community site a better place for all involved. DocuSign Community Super Users provide answers that get verified as the “best answers” and received many views, thus creating a more successful community experience. This program offers a token of gratitude for all of the commitment shown to ensuring the success of others!
fa7b93d7-fd03-4a7b-960d-df0ce8324e40.name: DocuSign Community Super User 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Be a top DocuSign Community contributor over the past two years.
Be a regular creator of solutions (Best Answers) and contribute positively to overall community health and success.
Regularly share advanced product knowledge.
Evangelize DocuSign products and community.

23626ab8-b1f0-4a79-bb47-2724ca5eec11.description: The DocuSign Agreement Cloud Academy is a global, leadership nominated program to develop, recognize and reward top-talent Architects while deepening capabilities across the Agreement Cloud. Academy members are high performing, high potential professionals who design, build and present solutions that can scale and evolve DocuSign’s business. This credential is available only to DocuSign employees in customer-facing roles.
23626ab8-b1f0-4a79-bb47-2724ca5eec11.name: DocuSign Agreement Cloud Academy

badge_template_activities.title: DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert (Gold)
Complete an accredited industry certification focused on one of our top verticals.
Successfully present a full DocuSign Agreement Cloud solution design for a complex customer use case to a panel of cross-functional senior experts, with only twenty-four hours to prepare.
Successfully present an innovative solution to a panel of cross-functional senior experts that has potential to advance the business and increase customer satisfaction and adoption.

16c918ad-b464-4e83-ab2e-7f30572ddbb0.description: Earning the DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert (Silver) credential demonstrates that the candidate has developed expertise in selling, supporting, and/or driving adoption of the DocuSign Agreement Cloud. This credential is available only to DocuSign employees in customer-facing roles.
16c918ad-b464-4e83-ab2e-7f30572ddbb0.name: DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert 2023 (Silver)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a comprehensive set of self-paced and in-person training courses as outlined by the DocuSign Agreement Cloud Expert program.
Successful completion of a series of hands-on activities, demonstrations, and written exams.
Evaluation and validation of successful completion by management.
